local_intent: Ensure white_carton is visible, then move above it by 0.05 m, align precisely, and verify approach completion.
assumptions: Carton is reachable and unobstructed for an approach 0.05 m above
Perception can localize the carton within timeout limits
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase consistent with GLOBAL_BT: visibility check/scan, detection, MoveAbove(0.05 m), precise alignment, then verify position.
